title: Supernatural Stories - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 9/5/19
itunes:title: Supernatural Stories - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 9/5/19
description:
George Noory and paranormal researcher Varla Ventura discuss some of her favorite supernatural ghost stories, debate why people like to be scared, and hear a story about the ghost of Mark Twain.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
